identity.name: Beheerder Pro
principles: Density with Clarity: High information density without visual clutter
Swiss Precision: Grids, alignment, and typography over decoration
Functional Color: Color is used only for status and action, not decoration
Directness: Dutch business culture is direct; the UI should be too

rules: Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all body text, inputs, and table data
Use JetBrains Mono for API keys, IDs, and code snippets
Labels must be uppercase, text-xs, and tracking-wide

layout.spacing: Comfortable but dense (p-6 for containers, p-4 for cards)
layout.radius: rounded-lg (0.5rem) - Avoid fully rounded corners for admin

sidebar.style: Fixed, Dark (slate-900) in both modes for contrast

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow (or very subtle)
cards.classes: bg-card border border-border rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

tables.style: Clean, horizontal lines only, hover rows
tables.header: bg-muted/50 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-medium text-muted-foreground

tabs.trigger: pb-3 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground data-[state=active]:text-primary data-[state=active]:border-b-2 data-[state=active]:border-primary transition-all

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or modal overlays. Blur-xl, opacity-80.
visual_enhancers.gradients: None for backgrounds. Subtle gradients allowed on 'Premium' badges or 'Upgrade' buttons only.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns/modals. Avoid large diffuse shadows.
visual_enhancers.motion: Micro-interactions on hover. Smooth transitions for tab switching. No heavy parallax.

placeholders.logo: Use a simple geometric shape (e.g., Hexagon) in Primary Color

phases.name: Setup & Layout
tasks: Create the Main Layout (Sidebar + Header + Content Area)

phases.name: Core Components
tasks: Build the `StatCard` component (Label, Value, Trend, Icon)
Build the `DataTable` component (Search, Filter, Pagination, Status Badge)

details.Klanten: Table view with status badges (Active, Inactive). Actions: Edit, Delete, Login as User.
details.Betalingen: List of transactions. Currency formatting (â‚¬). Status: Paid, Pending, Failed.
details.Modules: Grid of cards showing available add-ons. Toggle switches for enabling/disabling.
details.Module Verzoeken: List of requests needing approval. Approve/Deny buttons.
details.Workspaces: Table of tenant workspaces. Usage metrics (Storage, Users).
details.Domain Provisioning: Form for DNS settings. Status checks.
details.Domeinen: List of registered domains. Expiry dates.
details.Betaalmethodes: Settings form for Stripe/Mollie. API Key inputs.
details.Email: SMTP Configuration form. Template editor (simple textarea or rich text).
details.Website: Website Builder Interface. Full width. Drag & drop placeholder.
details.Update: Version history log. 'Check for Updates' button.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Keep the interface in Dutch (Klanten, Betalingen, etc.).
Dark mode must be fully supported and tested.
